Text:
This Movie is crap it do not work in quicktime Sucks
Crap Shit

Yes making H.264 QT compatible reduces quality because of changes in some fields,QT support for mp4 is poor-for example: QuickTime does NOT support 8x8 dct and intra prediction,which is embarrassing; so try playing in KMPlayer,or Media Player Classic,or BSPlayer,GOM player etc or even VLC or WMP.
I tried it on MPC and even then, the audio wasn't synched with the video, and at times, it even cut out completely. It is legit and good quality picture though. lol
